allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add Archive Center page with light/dark theme and compliance task modals

- Add Archive Center page \(/dashboard/archive\) with full light/dark theme support
- Add specialized task completion modals for compliance workflows:
  - CertificateTaskModal: Handle certificate expiry/renewal tasks
  - DocumentReviewModal: Handle document expiry tasks with upload
  - SOPReviewModal: Handle SOP review tasks
  - RAReviewModal: Handle Risk Assessment review tasks
  - CalloutTaskModal: Handle callout follow-up tasks with status updates
  - PPMFollowupModal: Handle PPM follow-up after callout placed
- Update TaskCompletionModal to route to appropriate modal based on task type
- Update CalloutModal to set asset ppm_status to ''service_booked'' for PPM callouts
- Update generate-daily-tasks to skip assets with ppm_status=''service_booked''
- Add Archive Center link to burger menu navigation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add missing task completion component files

These files were missing from the previous commit and are required
for the TaskCompletionModal import.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(gh pr create --title "Fix ingredients dropdown, temperature logging, and add data integrity system" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary

- **Ingredients dropdown**: Fixed dropdown positioning for fixed positioning mode
- **Temperature logging**: Fixed capture, display, and error handling for temperature monitoring tasks
- **Archive Center**: Added new page with full light/dark theme support
- **Recipe data integrity**: Added comprehensive database integrity monitoring system with validation, audit snapshots, and optimistic locking
- **Compliance gaps**: Added compliance gap detection and automatic PPM service task generation
- **UI fixes**: Fixed styling and data visibility across leave balances, rota, availability, and compliance matrix pages

## Key Changes

### Database Migrations
- `20260130000000_recipe_data_integrity.sql` - Data integrity system with version tracking and audit snapshots
- `20260130000001_fix_integrity_check_function.sql` - PostgreSQL compatibility fix
- `20260130000002_fix_integrity_check_schema.sql` - Schema column name corrections

### New Features
- Recipe data integrity health check API \(`/api/health/data-integrity`\)
- Client-side recipe validation \(`src/lib/validation/recipeValidation.ts`\)
- Archive Center page with theme support

### Bug Fixes
- Fixed ingredient dropdown position calculation
- Fixed temperature range validation for freezers
- Fixed asset nickname extraction from nested fields
- Fixed pack_size type casting in price history trigger

## Test plan
- [ ] Verify ingredients dropdown positions correctly in recipe editor
- [ ] Test temperature logging saves and displays correctly
- [ ] Verify Archive Center page renders in both light and dark themes
- [ ] Run `SELECT * FROM check_recipe_data_integrity\(company_id\)` to verify integrity checks
- [ ] Test `/api/health/data-integrity` endpoint returns valid response

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "c:\\Users\\bruce\\my-app" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: contact form, admin light theme, and visual polish

- Wire up contact form to send emails via Resend and store in Supabase
- Create /api/contact POST route with validation and error handling
- Add admin Contact Submissions page with search and table view
- Convert entire admin portal from dark to light theme \(#FAFAF7 bg\)
- Replace Shield icon with Opsly logo in admin sidebar
- Add shadow-sm and border-gray-200 to all admin cards for definition
- Strengthen inner dividers and sidebar borders
- Fix admin manifest theme_color to #D37E91
- Add contact_submissions table migration

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(/c/Users/bruce/my-app/_fix_theme.ps1 << 'PSEOF'
$files = @\(
  'c:\\Users\\bruce\\my-app\\src\\app\\customer\\dashboard\\page.tsx',
  'c:\\Users\\bruce\\my-app\\src\\app\\customer\\orders\\page.tsx',
  'c:\\Users\\bruce\\my-app\\src\\app\\customer\\order\\new\\page.tsx',
  'c:\\Users\\bruce\\my-app\\src\\app\\customer\\orders\\[id]\\page.tsx',
  'c:\\Users\\bruce\\my-app\\src\\app\\customer\\messages\\page.tsx',
  'c:\\Users\\bruce\\my-app\\src\\app\\customer\\feedback\\page.tsx',
  'c:\\Users\\bruce\\my-app\\src\\app\\customer\\waste\\page.tsx',
  'c:\\Users\\bruce\\my-app\\src\\app\\customer\\waste\\log\\page.tsx',
  'c:\\Users\\bruce\\my-app\\src\\app\\customer\\waste\\insights\\page.tsx',
  'c:\\Users\\bruce\\my-app\\src\\app\\customer\\standing-orders\\page.tsx',
  'c:\\Users\\bruce\\my-app\\src\\app\\customer\\reports\\monthly\\page.tsx',
  'c:\\Users\\bruce\\my-app\\src\\app\\customer\\setup\\page.tsx',
  'c:\\Users\\bruce\\my-app\\src\\components\\customer\\MonthlySpendCard.tsx',
  'c:\\Users\\bruce\\my-app\\src\\components\\customer\\WasteDashboardWidget.tsx'
\)

foreach \($file in $files\) {
  if \(!\(Test-Path $file\)\) {
    Write-Host "SKIP \(not found\): $file"
    continue
  }
  $content = Get-Content $file -Raw

  # D37E91 replacements - longer/more specific patterns first
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('hover:shadow-[0_0_12px_rgba\(211, 126, 145,0.7\)]'\), 'hover:shadow-module-glow'
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('hover:text-[#D37E91]/80'\), 'hover:text-module-fg/80'
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('focus:ring-[#D37E91]/50'\), 'focus:ring-module-fg/50'
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('focus:border-[#D37E91]/50'\), 'focus:border-module-fg/50'
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('text-[#D37E91]/80'\), 'text-module-fg/80'
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('bg-[#D37E91]/20'\), 'bg-module-fg/20'
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('bg-[#D37E91]/10'\), 'bg-module-fg/10'
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('text-[#D37E91]'\), 'text-module-fg'
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('bg-[#D37E91]'\), 'bg-module-fg'
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('border-[#D37E91]'\), 'border-module-fg'

  # bg-white hover replacements \(before non-hover bg-white\)
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('hover:bg-white/[0.05]'\), 'hover:bg-theme-hover'
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('hover:bg-white/[0.02]'\), 'hover:bg-theme-hover'
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('hover:bg-white/[0.1]'\), 'hover:bg-theme-muted'
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('hover:bg-white/10'\), 'hover:bg-theme-muted'

  # bg-white non-hover replacements \(longer decimal first\)
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('bg-white/[0.08]'\), 'bg-theme-muted'
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('bg-white/[0.06]'\), 'bg-theme-button-hover'
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('bg-white/[0.05]'\), 'bg-theme-hover'
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('bg-white/[0.03]'\), 'bg-theme-button'
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('bg-white/[0.02]'\), 'bg-theme-button'
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('bg-white/[0.01]'\), 'bg-theme-button'
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('bg-white/[0.1]'\), 'bg-theme-muted'
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('bg-white/10'\), 'bg-theme-muted'
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('bg-white/5'\), 'bg-theme-hover'

  # border-white hover replacements first
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('hover:border-white/20'\), 'hover:border-theme-hover'
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('hover:border-white/[0.1]'\), 'hover:border-theme-hover'

  # border-white non-hover
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('border-white/[0.15]'\), 'border-theme-hover'
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('border-white/[0.2]'\), 'border-theme-hover'
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('border-white/[0.06]'\), 'border-theme'
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('border-white/[0.1]'\), 'border-theme-hover'
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('border-white/20'\), 'border-theme-hover'

  # text-white
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('hover:text-white'\), 'hover:text-theme-primary'
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('text-white/90'\), 'text-theme-primary'

  # background
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('bg-[#0B0D13]'\), 'bg-[rgb\(var\(--background\)\)]'

  # Setup page specific replacements \(safe to run on all files, only matches if present\)
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('focus-visible:ring-emerald-500/50'\), 'focus-visible:ring-module-fg/50'
  $content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('border border-emerald-500'\), 'border border-module-fg'

  Set-Content $file $content -NoNewline
  Write-Host "DONE: $file"
}
PSEOF)

Bash(/c/Users/bruce/my-app/_fix_theme_id.ps1 << 'PSEOF'
$file = 'c:\\Users\\bruce\\my-app\\src\\app\\customer\\orders\\[id]\\page.tsx'
if \(!\(Test-Path -LiteralPath $file\)\) {
  Write-Host "SKIP \(not found\): $file"
  exit 1
}
$content = Get-Content -LiteralPath $file -Raw

# D37E91 replacements
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('hover:shadow-[0_0_12px_rgba\(211, 126, 145,0.7\)]'\), 'hover:shadow-module-glow'
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('hover:text-[#D37E91]/80'\), 'hover:text-module-fg/80'

$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('focus:border-[#D37E91]/50'\), 'focus:border-module-fg/50'
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('text-[#D37E91]/80'\), 'text-module-fg/80'
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('bg-[#D37E91]/20'\), 'bg-module-fg/20'
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('bg-[#D37E91]/10'\), 'bg-module-fg/10'
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('text-[#D37E91]'\), 'text-module-fg'
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('bg-[#D37E91]'\), 'bg-module-fg'
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('border-[#D37E91]'\), 'border-module-fg'

# bg-white hover
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('hover:bg-white/[0.05]'\), 'hover:bg-theme-hover'
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('hover:bg-white/[0.02]'\), 'hover:bg-theme-hover'
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('hover:bg-white/[0.1]'\), 'hover:bg-theme-muted'
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('hover:bg-white/10'\), 'hover:bg-theme-muted'

# bg-white non-hover
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('bg-white/[0.08]'\), 'bg-theme-muted'
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('bg-white/[0.06]'\), 'bg-theme-button-hover'
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('bg-white/[0.05]'\), 'bg-theme-hover'
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('bg-white/[0.03]'\), 'bg-theme-button'
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('bg-white/[0.02]'\), 'bg-theme-button'
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('bg-white/[0.01]'\), 'bg-theme-button'
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('bg-white/[0.1]'\), 'bg-theme-muted'
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('bg-white/10'\), 'bg-theme-muted'
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('bg-white/5'\), 'bg-theme-hover'

# border-white hover
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('hover:border-white/20'\), 'hover:border-theme-hover'
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('hover:border-white/[0.1]'\), 'hover:border-theme-hover'

# border-white non-hover
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('border-white/[0.15]'\), 'border-theme-hover'
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('border-white/[0.2]'\), 'border-theme-hover'
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('border-white/[0.06]'\), 'border-theme'
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('border-white/[0.1]'\), 'border-theme-hover'
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('border-white/20'\), 'border-theme-hover'

# text-white
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('hover:text-white'\), 'hover:text-theme-primary'
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('text-white/90'\), 'text-theme-primary'

# background
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\('bg-[#0B0D13]'\), 'bg-[rgb\(var\(--background\)\)]'

Set-Content -LiteralPath $file $content -NoNewline
Write-Host "DONE: $file"
PSEOF)

Bash(submodules" warning on Vercel deployments.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
